Articles.Content:
After positive ratings on my AC Hulk heavy transport and bomber, I present to you yet another Single-Stage-to-Orbit craft that everyone seems to want nowadays, made exclusively out of B9 Aerospace parts.

I present to you...

The Hypersonic Shuttle Mk I

Click for screenshots

This sleek craft functions as a crew transport as well as a extra large module and cargo transporter. Included with a state-of-the-art Comm. Satellite, that can deliver HD images of Jeb Kerman's wife.

4 high-powered atmospheric engines with 3 liquid-fueled Blendtec blenders will give you enough power to get you to Duna and back!

Complete with aesthetic lighting for windows and cargo bays, and optional navigational beacons.

More crafts to come.

Edited June 3, 2013 by TopGun904

Very unhappy at the lack of votes calling for the death of Padme Amidala.

So very disappointed in you, tMG community.
Looks very nice, could we get a download link maybe?
I hope you readers realize that "Death of Padme Amidala" made Vader yell "NOOOOOOOOOOOOO"

I hope you readers realize that "Death of Padme Amidala" made Vader yell "NOOOOOOOOOOOOO"

http://nooooooooooooooo.com/

There ya go

As for the plane, can you give us some stats like:

-Max payload to LKO.

-Part count.

-Weight.

-Ascent profile. ?
I am new to the forums... Is there a download link somewhere?
those wings don't look like any from the B9 pack, what are they?

those wings don't look like any from the B9 pack, what are they?

Those are the Procedural Wings, IIRC.

Holy frack!!!! no SABRE engines! You're skilled! And please download my ground attack plane, I'm new to the forum.http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/44822-Afterburner-limited-hanger-%28atmospheric-vessels-and-stuff%29/page2
